species.name: cetoddle
descriptions: It lives in frigid regions in pods of five or so individuals. It loves the minerals found in snow and ice.
This species left the ocean and began living on land a very long time ago. It seems to be closely related to Wailmer.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

abilities.name: snow-cloak
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: sheer-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.
